<style src="./HomeView.css"></style>
<template src="./HomeView.html"></template>
<script>
  import PagetitleComponent from '@/components/PagetitleComponent/PagetitleComponent.vue'

  // @ is an alias to /src
  // import HelloWorld from '@/components/HelloWorld.vue'

  export default {
    name: 'HomeView',
    data() {
      return {
        areaName: "Главная"
      }
    },
    components: {
      // HelloWorld,
      PagetitleComponent
    },
    inject: ["areaList"],
    computed: {
        areasList() {
            let n_areaList = [];
            for (let i=2; i<this.areaList.length; i++) {
                n_areaList[i-2] = this.areaList[i]; 
            }
            return n_areaList;
        }
    },
    methods: {
      readHtmlFile(url) {
        // let reader = new FileReader();

        const getData = async url => {
          const response = await fetch(url);
          const data = await response.readAsText();
          // const data = await response.json();
          console.log(url);
          console.log('data:::::::');
          console.log(data);
          return data;
        }
        return getData;

        // let file = input;
        
        // reader.readAsText(file);
        // reader.onload = function() {
        //   console.log(reader.result);
        // };

        // reader.onerror = function() {
        //   console.log(reader.error);
        // };
      }
    }
  }
</script>
